Export.Routine: INPSHTML(DATEI,YKEY,PREISKZ,MENGE) #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; DRUCKEN PREISEAUSZEICHUNGEN ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 07-Dec-2006 JW SR15274: Don't need details from INSALESPRICE. ; 27-Nov-2006 JW BR014285: Item group change ; 05.06.2001 FAN ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YI1,YI,HTML,HEUTE,ARTNR,WG,STANDARD,ZUSATZ,WIDTH1,WIDTH2,WIDTH3,SITZ,STANDARDTITEL,ZUSATZTITEL ;--------------------------------------------------------- ; ARTIKEL NUMMER ;item numeral ; DRUCKDATUM ; VERKAUFSPREIS IN DM ;within ; VERKAUFSPREIS IN EUR ;within ; SET YNOFOOT=1 IF $PIECE($GET(^INPSHTML(YM,PREISKZ,1)),Y,4)'="" DO . SET HTML=$PIECE($GET(^INPSHTML(YM,PREISKZ,1)),Y,4) . SET HTML1=$PIECE(HTML,"",1)_">" . SET HTMLKOPF=HTML1_HTML2_"" . SET HTMLBODY=$PIECE($PIECE(HTML,HTML2,2),"",1)_"" . QUIT IF $PIECE($GET(^INPSHTML(YM,PREISKZ,1)),Y,5)'="" DO . SET HTMLT=$PIECE($GET(^INPSHTML(YM,PREISKZ,1)),Y,5) . SET HTMLT1=$PIECE(HTMLT,"",1)_">" . SET HTMLTKOPF=HTMLT1_HTMLT2_"" . SET HTMLTBODY=$PIECE($PIECE(HTMLT,HTMLT2,2),"",1)_"" . QUIT ;-----------------HTML----------------------------------- FOR YI1=1:1:1200 SET YI(1)=$PIECE(HTMLBODY,$CHAR(9),YI1) DO QUIT:$FIND(YI(1),"") ;LESEN HTML-CODE ;read . ;SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1)," VALUE="_""""_"""",1)_$PIECE(YI(1)," VALUE="_""""_"""",2) ;VALUE=FALSCH . ;----------------BILD . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,54)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET BILD="" . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_BILD_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,54)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET BILD="",1)_BILD_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;---------------ARTNR . IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . IF DATEI="INART" SET ARTNR=YKEY . . IF DATEI="INAUFP" SET ARTNR=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,4) . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_ARTNR_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------ARTIKELBEZEICHNUNG . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------KUNDEN TEXT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,10)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . ;SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,10)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$EXTRACT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,10),0,4000)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) ;BEC;05.07.04;WEGEN MAXSTRING ;quibble . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,10)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------WARENGRUPPE . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,30)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,30)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,30)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET WG=$$$INVORGDefaultItemGroup(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)) . . //IF WG="" SET WG=$ORDER(^INPARA(YM,"WARENGRUPPE",SPRACH,"")) . . IF WG="" SET WG=$ORDER(^INItemGroup(YM,"")) //BR014285 . . . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_WG_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------SORTIMENT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,38)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,38)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,38)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------DRUCKDATUM . IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET HEUTE=$$^WWWDATE($HOROLOG) . . IF $EXTRACT(HEUTE,4)'=0 SET HEUTE=$EXTRACT(HEUTE,9,10)_$EXTRACT(HEUTE,4,5)_$EXTRACT(HEUTE,1,2) . . IF $EXTRACT(HEUTE,4)=0 SET HEUTE=$EXTRACT(HEUTE,9,10)_$EXTRACT(HEUTE,5)_$EXTRACT(HEUTE,1,2) . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_HEUTE_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------EK . IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET EK=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,47) . . SET EK=EK*100 . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_"11"_EK_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------VK MENGE EINHEIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,46)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,46),1)),Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,38)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------VK GÃœLTIG BIS . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,62)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWDATE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,62))_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,62)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-----------------------------------------------------1. PREIS IN ARTKEL STAMM . ;-------92-94---------PROVISION . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,92)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,92)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,92)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,94)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,94)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,94)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------90---------PREISKENNZEICHEN . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,90)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"PREISKENNZEICHEN",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,90),1)),Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,90)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------88---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN DM . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,88)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,88),10,2,"DM")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,88)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------88---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN EUR . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,88)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,88),10,2,"EUR")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,88)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO ;BEC;18.11.04;26682 . . //SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE($$^INSALESPRICE(YKEY,,,,,,,,1),Y,1),10,2,YWHR)_$PIECE(YI(1),">",2) . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($$^INSALESPRICE(YKEY),10,2,YWHR)_$PIECE(YI(1),">",2) // SR15274 . ; . IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO ;BEC;18.11.04;26682 . . NEW PREICEID . . SET PREICEID=$PIECE($$^INSALESPRICE(YKEY,,,,,,,,1),Y,4) . . IF PREICEID'="" SET PREICEID=$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"PREISKENNZEICHEN",SPRACHE,PREICEID,1)),Y,1) . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_PREICEID_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ; . ;-----------------------------------------------------2. PREIS IN ARTKEL STAMM . ;-------102-104---------PROVISION . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,102)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,102)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,102)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,104)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,104)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,104)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------100---------PREISKENNZEICHEN . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,100)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"PREISKENNZEICHEN",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,100),1)),Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,100)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------98---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN DM . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,98)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,98),10,2,"DM")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,98)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------98---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN EUR . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,98)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,98),10,2,"EUR")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,98)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ; . ; . ;-----------------------------------------------------3. PREIS IN ARTKEL STAMM . ;-------112-114---------PROVISION . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,112)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,112)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,112)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,114)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,114)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,114)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------110---------PREISKENNZEICHEN . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,110)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"PREISKENNZEICHEN",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,110),1)),Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,110)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------108---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN DM . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,108)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,108),10,2,"DM")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,108)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------108---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN EUR . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,108)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,108),10,2,"EUR")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,108)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ; . ;-----------------------------------------------------4. PREIS IN ARTKEL STAMM . ;-------122-124---------PROVISION . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,122)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,122)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,122)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,124)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,124)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,124)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------120---------PREISKENNZEICHEN . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,120)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"PREISKENNZEICHEN",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,120),1)),Y,1)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,120)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------118---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN DM . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),10,2,"DM")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;-------118---------VERKAUFSPREIS IN EUR . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)'="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,118),10,2,"EUR")_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,118)="" IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_" "_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ; . SET WIDTH1=10 ;SPALTEN BREITE :MENGE ;split width . SET WIDTH2=200 ;SPALTEN BREITE :BESCHREIBUNG ;split width . SET WIDTH3=90 ;SPALTEN BREITE :PREIS ;split width . SET SIZE=2 . SET STANDARD="" . SET ZUSATZ="" . ;---------------STANDARDTITEL . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . IF $PIECE(YFELDT,Y,20)'=2 SET STANDARDTITEL=$$^WWWTEXT(32523)_":" . . . QUIT . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$GET(STANDARDTITEL)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;---------------STANDARD . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . IF $PIECE(YFELDT,Y,20)'=2 DO . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,4) . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_""_YCR . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,3) . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_""_YCR . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_"" . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,1),1)),Y,88),,2,YWHR) . . . . SET STANDARD=STANDARD_""_YCR . . . . QUIT . . . QUIT . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$GET(STANDARD)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;---------------ZUSATZTITEL . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . IF $PIECE(YFELDT,Y,20)=2 SET ZUSATZTITEL=$$^WWWTEXT(32524)_":" . . . QUIT . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$GET(ZUSATZTITEL)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;---------------ZUSATZ . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . IF $PIECE(YFELDT,Y,20)=2 DO . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,4) . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_""_YCR . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,3) . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_""_YCR . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_"" . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,$PIECE(YFELDT,Y,1),1)),Y,88),,2,YWHR) . . . . SET ZUSATZ=ZUSATZ_""_YCR . . . . QUIT . . . QUIT . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$GET(ZUSATZ)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . QUIT . ;----------------WRITE . WRITE YCR . DO . . NEW I,YZWS,YII . . FOR YII=1:1 SET YZWS=$PIECE(YI(1),"|",YII) QUIT:$PIECE(YI(1),"|",YII,999)="" DO . . . WRITE YZWS ;$$^WWWUML(YZWS,1) . . . IF $PIECE(YI(1),"|",YII+1,999)'="" WRITE $CHAR(13)_$CHAR(10) . . . QUIT . . QUIT . QUIT ;-------------T----HTML----------------------------------- IF $PIECE($GET(^INPSHTML(YM,PREISKZ,1)),Y,5)'="" IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) FOR YI1=1:1:1200 SET YI(1)=$PIECE(HTMLTBODY,$CHAR(9),YI1) DO QUIT:$FIND(YI(1),"") ;LESEN HTML-CODE ;read . ;SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1)," VALUE="_""""_"""",1)_$PIECE(YI(1)," VALUE="_""""_"""",2) ;VALUE=FALSCH . ; . NEW WIDTH1,WIDTH2,WIDTH3,SITZ,STANDARDTITEL,ZUSATZTITEL . SET WIDTH1=10 . SET WIDTH2=200 . SET WIDTH3=90 . SET SIZE=2 . SET STANDARD="" . SET ZUSATZ="" . ;---------------STANDARDTITEL . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . SET STANDARDTITEL="" . . . IF $PIECE(YFELDT,Y,20)'=2 SET STANDARDTITEL=$$^WWWTEXT(32523)_":" . . . QUIT . . SET YI(1)=$PIECE(YI(1),"",1)_$GET(STANDARDTITEL)_$PIECE(YI(1),"",2) . . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR)) IF $FIND(YI(1),"") DO . . SET POS="" FOR SET POS=$ORDER(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS)) QUIT:POS="" DO . . . SET YFELDT=$GET(^INARTT(YM,ARTNR,POS,1)) . . . SET ZUSATZ="" . . .
